name: RGB DOUBLESHOT
description:
FIRST GODOT GAME PROJECT

Hi everyone! I am proud to announce my very first Godot game project as part of my submission to GE Jam #5! After hours of learning, research and development, I have created a game! I hope you enjoy it.

PROTOTYPE GAME

Like the I said above, this is a prototype game made in a very tight schedule as I learn and develop at the same time. Final game might be different though.

HOPES AND DREAMS

I like Godot engine so I really hope that the community can guide me more to achieve my dream to successfully learn all the important aspects of this game engine.

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

You can help me by giving constructive feedbacks and suggestions! Thank you.
